name: Evil Ded
description:
Uploading again due to file problems.

Made for Jim Jam's Game Jam @GameDevUnderground and is my first released game made in Unity.

Theme was "Inspiration" and what is more inspiring than a Campy Gorefest. Inspired by the Evil Dead series, Evil Ded will have you screaming in terror "Why do these demonic enemies do no damage!??" and "What twisted mind thought this music was OK?!" As I found out, there can be scarier things....

Like "time constraints".....

Enjoy.

W = FORWARD

LEFT CLICK = ATTACK
